about_the_game:
Welcome to NEXUS, a hostile world where survival is only the beginning. In this open-world co-op PvE shooter, you’ll join a team of sci-fi mercenaries tasked with securing resources, crafting powerful gear, and pushing back relentless android swarms that threaten humanity’s colonization efforts.

FEATURES:

Open-World MMO-Like Co-op – Team up with friends or go solo in a vast, ever-evolving world filled with dangers and opportunities.

Intense PvE Combat – Use an arsenal of high-tech weaponry and customizable subclasses to take on massive android hordes.

Strategic Resource Gathering – Deploy Miners to extract vital resources—but be ready to defend them against waves of enemies.

Deep Progression System – Level up, unlock new gear, and upgrade your armor to take on even greater threats.

Territory Expansion & Raids – Reclaim lost ground, establish fortified outposts, and tackle high-risk, high-reward Raid Miners for the ultimate challenge.

THE STORY:

After arriving at NEXUS, humanity’s last hope for colonization, disaster struck. A mysterious force of ruthless androids attacked, forcing survivors to retreat into scattered outposts. With limited resources and only a fraction of the colony awake from cryosleep, mercenaries like you are humanity’s best chance to reclaim what was lost. Gather resources, expand settlements, and fight back before it’s too late.

Do you have what it takes to turn the tide? Gear up. Drop in. Take back NEXUS.

Wishlist NEXUS_DROP now and prepare for battle!

content_descriptors.notes: Includes violence, blood and some gore.
